content: red heart® super saver® 1 skein each 312 black a 311 white b 319 cherry red c 321 gold d susan bates® crochet hook 5mm us h-8 yarn needle 4 stitch markers red florist s wire optional gauge 12 half_double_crochet = 4 10 cm 6 row = 4 10 cm check your gauge use any size hook to obtain the gauge pants measure 19 in circumference x 8 tall 48 5 x 20 5 cm excluding suspenders notes 1 pants are intended to hold wine bottles candle jars or other cylindrical gifts 2 all sections except suspenders belt and buckle are worked in rounds do not join at end of rounds unless otherwise instructed
